  • Constructor Details

    • FeudManager

      public FeudManager() throws LoginException
      Initializes login process for the bot.
      Throws:
      LoginException - occurs in the case of invalid bot token.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player p, net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Role teamrole)
      Adds a new player to a team using the provided team role (provided that the role is one of the registered team roles for the game.)
      Parameters:
      p - Player to add to the respective team list.
      teamrole - Role of the player to be added to the respective team list.

    • removePlayer

      public int removePlayer(Player p, net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Role teamrole)
      Removes the given player from the specified team.
      Parameters:
      p - The player to remove
      teamrole - The team to remove the player from.
      Returns:
      0 if the player was removed successfully, -1 if the player could not be found and removed.

    • findPlayer

      public Map<Player,net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Role> findPlayer(Player p, net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Role teamRole)
      Searches for the provided player in the provided team.
      Parameters:
      p - Player to be searched.
      teamRole - Team role of the player to be searched.
      Returns:
      A hashmap of the found player and role.
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - if player cannot be found.

    • removeHost

      public int removeHost()
      Removes the current host clears current host role in the game
      Returns:
      0 if host and host role was cleared successfully, -1 if there was no host and role to remove.
